snippet: “Einstein on the Beach,” the pathbreaking 1976 opera by the composer Philip Glass and the director Robert Wilson, is receiving an exhilarating revival at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews production of Philip Glass and Robert Wilson opera Einstein on the Beach, conducted by Michael Riesman, at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: “Einstein on the Beach,” the pathbreaking 1976 opera by the composer Philip Glass and the director Robert Wilson, is receiving an exhilarating revival at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.seo: ‘Einstein on the Beach,’ at the Brooklyn Academy of Music
headline.main: Time Travel With Einstein: Glass’s Opera Returns to the Stage
